hi: Hi, I am your chat bot,  how can I help u?
hey: Hey, I am your chat bot, how can I help u?
how to create profile: Click on Profile->Click on add button at the bottom right->Enter all the Details->Save
how to edit profile: Click on Profile->Click on the three dots at the top right ->Click on Edit Student ->Enter a correct addmission number for the respective ->Save Changes
how to search profile: Click on the Profile ->Enter admission number ->Find
how to create notes: Click on the Notes ->Click on the add button at the bottom right ->Add respective details -> Save
how to schedule lecture: Click on the Scheduler -> Click on the add button at the bottom right -> Select and fill respective details - > Save
how to take attendance: Click on Attendance - > Enter the time and subject of the class -> Select div and take the attendence -> Save
how to clear data: Click on the three dots at the top right - > Select Settings ->Select respective data to be cleared
